arduinoLight.channelprovider.generator.ambientlight

Class Ambientlight

  • java.lang.Object
    • arduinoLight.channelprovider.generator.ambientlight.Ambientlight
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Channelholder, ModifiableChannelholder

    public class Ambientlight
extends java.lang.Object
implements ModifiableChannelholder
    This class contains channels and screen selections. If it is started, it refreshes the channel-colors periodically, using the screen selection for each channel and and applying them to a taken screenshot.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addChannel(IChannel channel)
      Adds a new Channel with a default 2x2 Screenselection that has no selected Parts.
      java.util.Set<IChannel> getChannels()
      This method returns an unmodifiableList of the channels that are used for writing.
      Screenselection getScreenselection(IChannel channel)
      Returns the Screenselection assigned to that Channel.
      void removeChannel(IChannel channel)
      If the specified Channel is currently in use, it is removed
      void start(int frequency) 
      void stop()
